column1: nandor is a Qenya word meaning "farmer".
While listed by Helge Fauskanger in his Neo-Elvish wordlists
column2: he notes that the word is "perhaps obsolete in LotR-style Quenya
column3: clashing with the name of the Nandor".Helge Fauskanger
column4: "http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)" at http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion (accessed 16 June 2011)
